Generation III.Ruby: Dusclops 's body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pok é mon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
Generation III.Sapphire: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This Pok é mon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops 's bidding.
Generation III.Emerald: It is thought that its body is hollow with only a spectral ball of fire burning inside. However, no one has been able to confirm this theory as fact.
Generation III.FireRed: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.

Generation IV.Diamond: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
Generation IV.Pearl: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
Generation IV.Platinum: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.

Generation V.White: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
Generation V.Black 2: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
Generation V.White 2: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

Generation VI.X: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
Generation VI.Y: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Dusclops's body is completely hollow—there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This Pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Dusclops absorbs anything, however large the object may be. This Pokémon hypnotizes its foe by waving its hands in a macabre manner and by bringing its single eye to bear. The hypnotized foe is made to do Dusclops's bidding.

Generation VIII.Sword: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
Generation VIII.Shield: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the bandages, never to return. I've been too scared to verify.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Dusclops is feared because it's said to pull the soul out of anyone who gazes upon the strange movements of its hands.
Generation IX.Violet: Dusclops's true form is said to be a bright red eye burning within its body, but no one has ever seen such a thing.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 8 , Giant's Seat , Watchtower Ruins Giant's Mirror , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 8 , Giant's Seat , Watchtower Ruins Giant's Mirror , South Lake Miloch , Stony Wilderness , Watchtower Ruins ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: Route 224 ( Poké Radar ) Grand Underground - Dazzling Cave , Stargleam Cavern (After obtaining the National Pokédex )
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Route 224 ( Poké Radar ) Grand Underground - Dazzling Cave , Stargleam Cavern (After obtaining the National Pokédex )
